branch.title: Let’s meet in person
branch.detail: Do you have any questions? Call our Helpline or visit one of our branches

noPhone.title: What is your contact phone number?
noPhone.detail: In order to continue, we need to know your phone number. Please update it with the bank which you use for BankID, then return to continue your card application.

invalidToken.title: Unknown QR code
invalidToken.detail: Please make sure you are scanning the correct QR code and try again

contractDisagree.title: Máte nějaké otázky?
contractDisagree.detail: Zavolejte nám nebo se za námi stavte na nejblížší pobočku.

cancelledExpire.title: The request for a new card has been canceled
cancelledExpire.detail:
Since you did not complete the verification within 7 days, we have canceled your request.
To submit a new card application, please contact the account owner.

cancelledHolder.title: The request for a new card has been canceled
cancelledHolder.detail: To submit a new card application, please contact the account owner.

invalidData.title: Please check the details from the invitation and try verifying again
invalidData.detail:
It’s possible that your details differ from those listed in the invitation. Please ask the person who invited you to review them.

If it still doesn’t work, schedule an appointment at a branch and visit us together. We’ll be happy to help you complete the process.

alreadyExists.title: The verification process has been started on another device
alreadyExists.detail: Please use said device to finish it

start.title: Cardholder verification

bulletsExistingUser.title: Enter the remaining details for your new card
The card will be mailed to you as soon as the account owner confirms it.

start.bulletsTitleAcquisitionUserBankId: First, we will verify your identity via BankID

bulletsAcquisitionUserBankId.title: Log in to one of your other bank accounts
We will retrieve the necessary information
Identity verification
bulletsAcquisitionUserBankId.description: In the last step, we will verify your identity.

start.bulletsTitleAcquisitionUserDetails: Then, we will finalize the details

bulletsAcquisitionUserDetails.title: You will enter the remaining details for your new card and sign the agreement
The card will be sent as soon as the account owner confirms the request

deliveryAddress.title: Address for card delivery
deliveryAddress.changeAddressInfo:
Do you wish to have the card delivered to a different address?
Change the contact address in Settings under ‘About Me’

staticDocuments.title: Review the pre-contractual information
staticDocuments.detail: All documents can be found in Smart Banka, Internet Banka under ‘Document’ as well as in your email.

scoring.title: Just a moment, processing.
scoring.detail: It will only take a minute.

needsAnalysis.title: Review the insurance documentation
needsAnalysis.detail: All documents can be found in Smart Banka and Internet Banka uder ‘Documents’
needsAnalysis.agree: By clicking ‘Continue’ I confirm that I have reviewed the documents

contract.title: Review the Cardholder Agreement
contract.detail: All documents can be found in Smart Banka, Internet Banka under ‘Document’ as well as in your email.

victoryPlastic.title: Almost done - ine signatures are left
victoryPlastic.detail: Once the request has been approved by all approvers, your card will be sent.

victoryVirtual.title: Almost done - ine signatures are left
victoryVirtual.detail: Once the request has been approved by all approvers, your virtual card can be added to your smartphone.
